scenes.background: Alex and Lily have paused their debate. Monica looks thoughtful.
scenes.description: So, are we all agreeing to find a middle ground?

options.text: Yes, a balanced approach should work best for everyone.
options.analysis: You agreed with Alex, showing good emotional perception and social skills, but your motivation and self-regulation were moderate.

options.text: I still think a quicker decision might benefit us more.
options.analysis: You gently disagreed, emphasizing the importance of swift decision-making, showing high motivation but less empathy.

options.text: Maybe. Or we could just try different approaches and see which works.
options.analysis: You provided an abstract response without strong commitment, showing moderate emotional perception and empathy, but lower self-regulation.
